Package Model.EntityModel

Class Hitbox

java.lang.Object
Model.EntityModel.Hitbox
public class Hitbox extends Object
The Hitbox is a class that is associated with each entity in the game and manages collisions with the map

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(int dx, int dy)
      Update hitbox position
      Parameters:
      dx - : the value of how much to increase the x of the hitbox
      dy - : the value of how much to increase the y of the hitbox

    • checkCollision

      public boolean checkCollision(int x, int y)
      this method handles collisions with map walls and obstacles
      Parameters:
      x - : x coordinate of the player
      y - : y coordinate of the player
      Returns:
      boolean: returns true if the player can move x, y
